nodes.label: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Healthy plant with vibrant green leaves and upright stems
Wilting plant with drooping leaves and dried out pot
Spindly plant with pale or yellowish leaves in shaded area
Understands that sufficient water and light result in a healthy plant
Understands that lack of water leads to wilting and drooping
Understands that lack of light results in weak and pale plants
